content.detailedDescription: Watching tv & noticed 2 big bright lites in near distance.  i thought oh a new tower with 2 huge lites attached, but no tower.  went outside the lites did not move at all and a lite came off top right corner and a small craft came off the lite and hovered below the big ufo took off towards me and went right over my home extremely low.  it was diamond shaped had a rectangular light underneath it.  in that rectangle was a red light then a white light then a green light. the lites were not flashing.  the ufo was humongouse, made a humming noise.  when it took off the small thing that came out of it went straight up.  when the light came out of the right corner or what would have been the right corner (the only thing i could see at that point were the 2 huge lites) it seemed that the small thing came off that light. almost like it was poured out of that light.  anyway it scarced me a lot and i have looked for a hovering jet picture on the net but did not see any that looked like it and why would a hovering jet be spitting out a small craft like that.  before it took off it had stayed unmoving at least 10 mins maybe longer before i noticed it.  in relationship to it's size it was huge.  i watch planes in the distance from my backyard and the little thing that came out of the big ufo would have been the size of a commercial airplane like i see all the time going toward harrisburg airport.  so the big ufo was really really big.  i will draw some pics of what i saw.  but i will not become fixated by this happening to me but it has changed me and i am perplexed and would like to be told that it was military on some sort of training mission.
content.summary: 2 huge lights hoovering  lite came out of corner and a small light came out and hoovered below until big ufo took off & flew over my home. small craft flew straight up then.

content.detailedDescription:
On friday, april 21, 2017 while fishing on increase lake east of beverly, wa and south of highway 90 by approximately 10 miles an extremely white light caught my attention. this extremely bright light was at or near at 60 degrees above the horizon, that horizon was a desert ridge with no houses or other structures that stretches east to west north of vertical lake.

this light remained stationary in a clear blue sky for the entire thirty minutes i was able to see it. it would diminish in intensity then increase in intensity, vaguely appearing as a vertical. rectangle. when diminished it appeared that the area immediately around the light vibrated...Then the light would again increase in intensity once more.

when it was at full intensity its "whiteness" was greater that the whitest of nearby clouds.

at one point it was obscured by the cloud but with the passage of the small cloud it remained in the original location.

one small plane passed nearby flying west to east at what appeared to be a lower altitude. two commercial jets flying east from the seattle area fly over at what appeared to be a high altitude cruising height.

there were various large and small birds during the sighting. 

this is an area also used for military air training but no military planes were visible during this sighting.

of note....I could only see the light through my polaroid glasses. 

when i removed my glasses i could see the airplanes and the birds and even flying insects but i could not see the light. replacing my glasses allowed me once more to spot the light.

i spend a lot of time outdoors and i have excellent sight. i watch the sky all the time. 

i was careful to observe fixed items in the near to middle ground that i could use to triangulate the location of the light. and, i can say with reasonable confidence that it did not move in 30 minutes while clouds blew by, planes flew over, birds passed by...

i took photos and after an extensive search of those photos using a professional photography app [lightroom] i was able to locate against the sky a white point of light however i could not capture the pulsated brightness to dimness of the sighting nor could i see the "zone" of wavy lines just around/in front of the light.
content.summary: A pulsating extremely white light that did not move in 30 minutes against a clear blue sky

content.detailedDescription: Already done
content.summary: I already reported this. i wanted to add the photos plus i reported after midnight on my report so i got the date wrong. it was  approx 10:30 on april 21 not 22.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the lake with my husband and a two other couples celebrating a friends birthday. we were about 2 miles out on the lake, just off of montrose at about 10pm. we were enjoying ourselves when i happen to look up and saw what looked like a giant bat, and not like a fox bat (which i looked up and saw was the biggest bat). this bat was as tall as my husband who is 6'4 or even bigger. it was solid black with eyes that seem to reflect the moonlight. this bat was blacker than the surrounding night sky and was perfectly silhouetted against the moonlit sky. this bat circled the boat three times in complete silence before heading off towards montrose. it quickly blended into the night sky and was gone in seconds.

about five minutes after seeing this bat we saw a bright green object traveling north to south at the horizon. it was not a plane as it was brilliant green and was moving slowly across the horizon. if i had to estimate, it was about 2 miles from our position. 

after the object was out of sight, we sat there looking around in stunned silence. i began feeling this overwhelming sensation of dread and told my husband that i felt that it was prudent that we get off the water as quickly as possible. i tried to get a picture of the thing as it circled our boat, but all i got was black.
content.summary: Saw a giant bat then followed by a bright

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog behind a small shopping area parking lot within 300' of my residence. i heard a sound above and to the right. through a break in the overcast, i saw a large triangle shaped object with structural surface features and lights. it was moving slowly (forward i assume) at what could have been between 500' to 1500'. it suddenly began to disappear from the trailing end, the transparency revealing normal empty sky. my initial reaction was astonishment. i immediately began to question myself. did i really just see this? i am a private pilot of 30 years and am very familiar with just about all general aviation as well as commercial and military aircraft. i also know the typical low altitude flight and approach/departure paths locally. what i saw was outside of design and behavioral norms. the entire event lasted between two to three seconds.
content.summary: Personal observation of very short duration

content.detailedDescription: couple driving, observed four large white lights in distance attached to underside of a hovering boomerang object which is hundreds of yards in size. the object seemed to vanish without motion as we watched
content.summary: Couple driving, observed four large white lights in distance attached t underside of a hovering boomerang object

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back home at around 10oclock when a bright light which looked like a meteor caught my attention it was moving fast and then it turned you could see lights at the back which looked separated by thick black lines then it disappeared.After this i was actually happy i witnessed this event.
content.summary: A bright burning object at high speed which changed direction and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Traveling towards naches wa on us-12 approx. 2:00am in my personal vehicle when my passenger and i both suddenly see three separate but identical objects fly over us very fast. they seemed to be in perfect alignment with the road but high in the air. each object had four white lights in a diamond shape. it was too dark to see the surface of the objects. we both only saw them for about four seconds and tried to figure out what they were. within 45 seconds after the sighting we saw several (5+) military vehicles traveling in the same direction as the objects. they appeared to be in a hurry as if in pursuit of the objects. we are in this area very often and have never seen military vehicles in this area. my passenger and i always talk about this incident to this day, although this sighting was in 2014 it is something we will never forget.
content.summary: Traveling in personal vehicle to see 3 seperate identical object fly over us very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed from a ranch house front porch on the cranes mill road in comal county, texas. craft hovered over a hill. estimated to be about 2,500' long. reported the siting to the tower at randolph afb. was instructed to write a report to a washington dc address. received a reply.
occupation: geologist
content.summary: Hovered for about 25 minutes and then moved off at a very high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on i-10 eastbound from the 101 freeway when a large white light past me from behind and to the right of the freeway. it was dark and approximately 5am. first i thought it was an airplane coming in to land at sky harbor but quickly realized it appeared to large and had no red or green lights and no flashing red strobe. it almost appeared as if it were a police helicopter with its spotlight on me, but it continued flying east at a high speed and the brightness never dimmed. the moon and a planet were in the distance ahead of it. this object was larger and brighter than the large planet that was viewable at 5am. it went from the west valley over the airport and turned north or northeast once it hit the east valley. i think it was at about 1000 to 2000 feet so i lost it over the horizon shortly after it turned left. this object flew very quickly. much faster than a commercial plane coming in on approach to sky harbor. i've never seen an aircraft this brightly lit or flying so fast at this low elevation.
content.summary: Extremely bright light flew over phoenix heading east then turned north or northeast once it past airport

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on i-10 eastbound from the 101 freeway when a large white light past me from behind and to the right of the freeway. it was dark and approximately 5am. first i thought it was an airplane coming in to land at sky harbor but quickly realized it appeared to large and had no red or green lights and no flashing red strobe. it almost appeared as if it were a police helicopter with its spotlight on me, but it continued flying east at a high speed and the brightness never dimmed. the moon and a planet were in the distance ahead of it. this object was larger and brighter than the large planet that was viewable at 5am. it went from the west valley over the airport and turned north or northeast once it hit the east valley. i think it was at about 1000 to 2000 feet so i lost it over the horizon shortly after it turned left. this object flew very quickly. much faster than a commercial plane coming in on approach to sky harbor. i've never seen an aircraft this brightly lit or flying so fast at this low elevation.
content.summary: Extremely bright light flew over phoenix heading east then turned north or northeast once it past airport

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car about to go into the office i work at in a suburb of chicago. when i noticed a bright reflection coming from an object in the sky. i noticed it moving oddly as if it was tumbling end to end but didn't seem to be falling but flying on a relaxed heading. didn't seem to be moving quickly but hard to tell as i couldn't determine size or proximity. i thought it was odd so i quickly pulled out my iphone 7 and took a photo burst (the mode my phone happened to be on already) it then moved out of view behind some foliage.
content.summary: Seemed to have a tumbling motion briefly saw it snapped at photo burst with iphone 7

content.detailedDescription: Orb apeared in photo taking as i was taking photo of the sauser shaped cliud behind it orb was in 1 out of 4 pictures taking with in 5 secounds.
content.summary: Was looking at sauser shape cloud behind it  ,, blew up secound picture and orb appeared

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my apartment last night at 9:30 pm to have a cigarette and after i lit up i look up to the sky to gaze at the stars and i noticed this diamond shaped figure that was glowing red with a fire ball at the bottom,the direction was traveling eastward and descending towards the field that the university of maine owns. i viewed this event until it went below the tree line  i then garbed my video camera that was in my apartment and i garbed my car keys  and i went looking to see if there was a landing. i found nothing.
content.summary: Diamond shaped red object

content.detailedDescription:
While driving north on rte 93 heading towards boston massachusetts,just beyond the lng gas tanks in dorchester, i looked up at one of the skyscrapers 
and noticed a large square/rectangular object hovering off to the left of it 
over rte 93. it was approximately 9:30am, and traffic was moving slowly. 
i had witnessed something similar in 2013, in the same general area, and knew 
i had to try to get a picture of it this time. 
it appeared to be pewter colored and dull. it seemed to hover for a bit then slowly start to move towards the east.
i eventually lost sight of it when i entered the tip o'neal tunnel.
content.summary: Saw a large square/rectangular object hovering above rte 93 in boston  massachusetts.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving to work heading north on rte 93 in boston massachusetts on october 6th at approximately 9:30am, i observed a large hovering square/rectangular object 
just north of the lng gas tanks in  dorchester.  i was able to take a few 
photos with my cell phone. 
when i reviewed the photos i also noticed a large helicopter off to the west 
of the object. 
i have no idea what i was looking at,but did observe something very similar in 2013 over the same general area. ever since that time, i always try to be 
observant of the sky around me.
content.summary: Driving north on rte 93 in boston in observed a large hovering object up ahead. it was  square/rectangular, and dull gray in color.

content.detailedDescription: Around 5. 10pm,  when iam roaming at my terrace and chatting with my friend,  i saw a strange thing in sky and iam so wondered and also scared to know what it is,  it was oval shapped flying object moving from south west to south in bright white and silver colour..  it was moving fastly..  when i called my frnd to see what it is,  i turned around and from that within 2 secs it disappeared.. i cant identify what is that yet... and my friend cant see it because it disappeared so fast.
content.summary: It was oval shapped moving fastly in sky and it was bright white coloured and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sleeping when she woke me and said look at the light in the room. i went to the sliding door where i saw the light over the south east sky and i could hear this hum outside our bedroom sliding door around 5am on the 20th of november, 2016. i then went outside and saw this orb shaped light moving in a different way. i placed my cell phone on the wood fence so it would not shake while taking the video.

the object moved erratically and gave me a feeling of calm.  then it left when i tried to relocate my camera to a different position.  it just left.
content.summary: Orb of white light

content.detailedDescription: About 7-8 globe ufo lights, which 3 orange-red and theother white, the main orange one was bigger then the others still in the same position while the other around it where changing position every 5 mins, creting a sort of geometrical alligment betewn them as ll in one line alligned, then triangular allgment then as a pentagunous ecc
content.summary: 7-8 ufos changing geometrical positions with their direction

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling north on i65 between crown point, indiana to lake station, indiana. i noticed an object outside the driver side window to the west. my driver was going approximately 75mph. the object was going much faster than the speed we were going. it seemed to be moving along the i65 corridor. i watched the object for approximately 45 seconds. it then made a sudden hard right turn, nothing that any conventional jet to maneuver, and disappeared into the clouds. as we made our way to lake station,i could see a fighter jet an f16? this was clearly a military jet that could only fly in a straight line. i'm still shaken by this experience.
content.summary: Witnessed an object i can't explain in indiana.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend went out to take some pictures as i'm an amateur photographer so i set my nikon d3300 on a tripod and set the iso to 100 and the shutter speed at 30 seconds to try capture stars but instead captured this. i first noticed this object as i was walking on a field i was going to take pictures on. this immediately caught my eye but i thought it was just a bright star so i decided to take a picture. i lost sight of the object when i returned home.
content.summary: Strange object moving slowly to the left. later vanished into the night.

content.detailedDescription:
1.Hudson river, passing by to see the statue of liberty.
2.Later on looking at the picture. notices a bright light with object on top.
3.Thought it could definitely be a ufo.
4.I can't describe the object and how it behaved because i notice on the picture.
5.I felt like this is a good opportunity to see i actually snapped a ufo. a real one.
6.I never had sight of it, didn't notice until reviewing my pictures
content.summary: Noticed in the picture.  did not see while seeing landscape.

content.detailedDescription:
Object was faint and quite large. about half a fist long.  travelled the observable sky in a few seconds. the leading end appeared larger.
was outside observing the sky looking towards the big dipper when i saw the object travelling about the level of polaris . it was fainter then the big dipper stars . my feeling was that i was seeing a meteor or other object that desintigrated
content.summary: Object was faint and quite large. about half a fist long.  travelled the observable sky in a few seconds. the leading end appeared larger

content.detailedDescription: Seen ufo two weeks prior to this picture i got. been a jet scrambled a good few times in the weeks since the first sighting and my second one were i got picture. also, feel like maybe this thing may be looking at me. maybe just in my head.
content.summary: Seen this ufo a couple of weeks before this sighting. then got picture. also jet scrambled

content.detailedDescription: We were living at fort shafter, hi in late june 2013.  we were sitting on our backyard patio after dark when we noticed a ball of flame slowly floating from the se coming towards us.  it looked like the flame you see on a hot air balloon.  there was no sound from this ball of light and it lazily floated from the direction of honolulu and over our house.  we went out front to continue watching it and it suddenly ascended straight up very quickly - still without a sound.  it was out of our sight within seconds.  until it made that sudden ascent, i thought it was a hot air balloon.
content.summary: Ball of flame on slow path, then ascended out of sight very quickly

content.detailedDescription: my picture is just one souvenir to landscape in area ...Nothing observed to suspect , just my picture is witness & real ...Thank's mufon
content.summary: Ufo forme de boomerang , vol stationnaire , picture only

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in hot tub with granddaughter. the fiery color made us notice. we didn't know what to think. the first one came from behind our maple tree and we watched. then another one came between the neighbors house and tree. both continued east to west and we saw the light of a third behind the tree but it never came out. i have photos but can't seem to upload them on here.. the clouds were hanging low so i couldn't tell if the 2 just went into the clouds or just disappeared.. i can message photos. not that great  but interesting. taken with iphone
content.summary: 2flaming lights traveling east to west. 1 i believe shot up

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were looking for meteorites, hoping to see flashes and tails. i was looking to the west, my wife, to the east. about 5 mins. into it, i saw what i thought was a sattelite moving from the south east to the north, i flashed my military grade light toward it and it flashed and stopped, just stopped./ my wife didn't see it when it was moving, but did see it stopped. the object then started moving directly east...........Same speed, same distance. it maintained the speed until it was out of sight, at the same time i saw another sattelite lime "star" to the south that was moving north, stopped and took off toward the east, on a parallel path with the other "craft" to the north.
content.summary: Observed a light slowly headed north and 30 seconds later it stopped for 30 seconds then headed directly west.

content.detailedDescription: Sept. 2016 9:03am.- i had just left my house three minutes prior to seeing the object.  i was driving to downtown atlanta.  i live in a suburban area of metro atlanta.  at this time of the morning, the traffic has slowed down somewhat.  it was a sunny morning.  as i was driving, i gazed upward to the trees then to a small group of clouds of about 45 degrees or slightly higher from the horizon.   that’s when i saw a small stationary object in the sky just below the clouds.  it didn’t appear to be a plane off in the distance.  it had no movement, and its shape and color didn’t fit that of a plane.  it almost shimmered but to more accurately describe it, it looked like something out of a sci-fi movie.  it looked like it was slightly phasing in and out.  the clouds were not obstructing my view.  they were above it.   the phasing was more like coming into focus then softly losing its integrity but not losing its outline.  it continued phasing in/out the entire time i viewed it.  the object didn’t have a solid outline like that of an airplane.  the outline was a somewhat fuzzy but i could still make out the dome shape (walnut-dome like shape with a flattened ring around the center).  the sighting lasted about 7 seconds then the object disappeared.  it didn’t fly off.  it just vanished.  a second later, i drove by some trees that blocked my view .  the road curved slightly back to the east.  i stopped at the intersection waiting for the light to change.  i looked back up to the sky but the sun was more in my line of site at this point, and i could not see as well.  i still had about a 45-minute drive to atlanta.  i continued to look for the object/craft but did not see it again.  at first i was in disbelief that i saw something that i couldn’t explain.  i immediately started taking notes of what i saw.  at each intersection that i stopped, i wrote down a few more notes.  the more i thought of it, i felt some excitement but then i started to think, ‘what else could it be?’  it didn’t have a definite shape or appearance like a drone or a plane.   what really stood out was that the object was phasing or shimmering in and out and not moving in any direction.  the rest of that morning i kept looking at the sky, hoping to see it again and maybe i’d be able to tell what it really was, maybe see something that could explain what i saw.  i was looking for evidence that it was man-made or some explanation and then i could put this to rest and not focus on it any longer.  i’ve not seen it or any other objects since then. (i've attached a sketch i made the day i saw the object/craft)
content.summary: Sept. 2016–suburb of metro atlanta.  9:03am southeastern sky. i saw a dome shaped object phasing in and out for 8 seconds then it vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was out for my nightly walk through the neighborhood at 9:30 pm.  i saw three bright bluish white lights moving south to north and passing directly overhead.  the lights moved steadily to the north, but as they did so they swarmed around each other like bees, and randomly pulsated.  the neighborhood was very quiet with no traffic.  the lights were totally silent, making absolutely no sound. i ran to my house and alerted my wife.  we both stood on the driveway and watched the lights slowly fly off to the north.  the lights continued to pulsate randomly. the night sky was clear with no clouds. another neighbor also witnessed the event.
content.summary: Observed three bluish-white lights with varying brightness totally silent moving south to north with  "swarming" action.
